title: Damakku Damakku Lyrics Aadhavan  Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Damakku Damakku Dama
Naan Thillalengadi Aama
Manam Thudikithu Amma
Oru Aatam Podhalama
Damakku Damakku Dama
En Joli Jaali Dama
Balam Irukudamma
Podhu Panamum Serudu Amma
Anubavida Endren Endren Naan
Andavanum Thandan
Eduthikada Indre Indre Endru
Aadavanum Vandan
Yai Rosa Rosa Raasa Vandu Leysa Paada

Damakku Damakku Dama
Naan Thillalengadi Aama
Manam Thudikithu Amma
Oru Aatam Podhalama
Damakku Damakku Dama
En Joli Jaali Dama
Balam Irukudamma
Podhu Panamum Serudu Amma

Netrenbadhu Mudinthadu Nilaivinil Illai
Naan Nalaiku Nadapathu Ninaipadillai
Indru Enbadu Thaviravum Edhuvum Illai
Un Adhinaan Idayatil Kavalai Illai

Vattam Pottu Nee Valvadarku
Vazhkai Enna Ganidama
Ellai Thaandi Nee Aadi Paadu
Yeduvum Illai Punidama
Nenjil Illai Bayam Bayam
Neram Vandal Jeyam Jeyam

Damakku Damakku Dama
Naan Thillalengadi Aama
Manam Thudikithu Amma
Oru Aatam Podhalama
Damakku Damakku Dama
En Joli Jaali Dama
Balam Irukudamma
Podhu Panamum Serudu Amma

Ellorukum Jeyikira Kaalam Varum
Unkuda Thaan Bhoomiye Kidandu Varum
Un Paadaiyil Ayiram Virupam Varum
Nilamalai Odhidu Eelaku Varum
Vaanam Mele Ye Bhoomi Kile
Vaasalin Aakal Naduvinile
Kolil Mele Vaanam Illai
Pudithavan Nadapan Kadalile
Thirumbi Paaru Dhinam Dhinam
Thirukku Nooru Sugam Sugam

Damakku Damakku Dama
Naan Thillalengadi Aama
Manam Thudikithu Amma
Oru Aatam Podhalama
Damakku Damakku Dama
En Joli Jaali Dama
Balam Irukudamma
Podhu Panamum Serudu Amma

Anubavida Endren Endren Naan
Andavanum Thaandan
Eduthikada Indre Indre Endru
Aadavanum Vandan
Rosa Rosa Raasa Vandu Leysa Paada

seo.title: Damakku Damakku Lyrics Aadhavan  Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Damakku Damakku Lyrics Aadhavan  Song Lyrics from Aadhavan. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Harrish Jeyaraj and sung by Benny Dayal. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Aadhavan, Harrish Jeyaraj, Benny Dayal, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
